name: Skull Flip Top Cigarette Lighter Limited Edition Art SM Violano
description:
Limited- Edition Gifts
<center>with Images by Award- Winning Artist SM Violano</center>


New Release:  Grandfather's Nightstand


This sale is for one (1) flip-top cigarette lighter
Please see our other items- we offer discounts on shipping!

Product Details

This high quality metal chrome flip top lighter is a wick, flint and fluid fuel petrol lighter. 
(Wick and flint is included, the fluid fuel petrol is not included, you can easily buy from 
your local stores.) The images have been protected with crystal clear enamel coating, 
for long time duration. It measures 2.25"(H) x 1.5"(W) x 0.5"(D), and comes with a gift tin box.

This is not a cheap paper sticker or dull engraved image. High quality lighter. Makes a great gift.

Products are shipped directly from the overseas manufacturer- 
Please allow up to three weeks for shipping
Shipping for each additional purchase to the same address is only $1.00!  

RETAILERS- WE DO SELL WHOLESALE WITH A MINIMUM ORDER
Old Dog Tricks- Selling the Perfect gift for the pet lover in your life!

About This Artist- With Permission from the Artists Web Site:

When I walk the halls of the Animal Shelter the eyes behind the bars plead. Most look with eager curiosity and some wish to play. 
Others no longer make eye contact and have withdrawn into themselves- hope fading dim. To make a difference and to help
 find a home for those pets who have been so overlooked is my fondest hope. Maybe - just maybe - there is a chance for a fairy
 tale ending for a deserving pet that nobody else seems to notice. A pet who has begun to lose hope.

It is my dearest hope that in the end I will have made a difference....

Biography

When I was a child the world was a place to be freely explored. I would ride my bike, the sun in my
 face and the wind blowing my hair, anywhere my heart desired. My friends and I would build forts,
 dig holes to China and our greatest worry was to be home before dinnertime. My art career started during such 
an excursion, when digging past the layer of sand in the local park playground I happened upon a wonderful discovery.
 Here at my fingertips was a thick slab of adobe earth clay. This discovery led to hours of sculpting subjects,
 usually the family dog. Soon my creations became more and more detailed. My father told me of the local history 
and the role that the native adobe clay played in building homes. It was this love of art, animals and history that lead
 me to change mediums to painting which allowed me to record even greater detail and imagery in a smaller space.
 Between commissions and gallery work I began painting hard- to- place homeless animals (Seniors, disabled and common pets)
 in public shelters. The eyes of those dogs and cats hoping to find a loving companion were haunting. In order to try and
 bring attention to the plight of the animal I began placing the painted studies of the homeless pets for sale, telling
 the story of the subject in the description. To date I have painted and sold over 200 homeless pet paintings,
 donating back a portion of sales to the rescue or animal shelter housing the pet. 

Violano has won two international awards and is listed in the Bluebook of North American Artists as well as being published
several magazines.  Her work is widely collected and she is currently been hired to illustrate her first book.  

FOR MORE INFORMATION ON THE STORIES BEHIND THE PAINTINGS SEE THE ARTISTS BLOG!
It has an extensive list of paintings and the stories of the real-life subjects!



Our Return Policy:
We guarantee against manufacturers defects.
Please allow up to 3 weeks for shipping

name: Skull Goth Cigarette Case / Money Valet /tip holder Art SM Violano
description:
Our brand new high quality silver chrome with a matte finish, mini- valet, 
cigarette case, wallet, sewing kit or first-aid case, or credit card case, is a 
double sided case. The size of the case is approximatly 4" x 2 1/4", and 
1/2" deep. It will hold credit cards, money or whatever you want and fits 
comfortably in a purse or pocket.  If you do smoke it will hold up to 16 
cigarettes.   The image is covered by crystal clear enamel, for long time 
protection.


This is not a cheap paper sticker or dull engraved image. High quality lighter. Makes a great gift.

Products are shipped directly from the overseas manufacturer- 
Please allow up to three weeks for shipping
Shipping for each additional purchase to the same address is only $1.00!
